```{ojs}

```

```{ojs}
//| echo: false
data = {
  const flare = await d3.json(
    "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/vanHeemstraSystems/learning-d3-voronoi-treemap/main/data/flare.json"
  );
  return d3.hierarchy(flare).sum((d) => (d.children ? 0 : Math.random()));
}
```

```{ojs}
//| echo: false
__topicsChart = {
  return renderChart({
    data,
    size: { width, height: 400 }
  });
}
```
